text: I didn’t look out cause my car was vibrating badly n I was focusing on high beaming the car in front to ask him to drive faster 😅
what car is it? i escaped flash floods many times. lucky. if water enters into your exhaust  it can cause hesitation. revv high to blast off prevent water from entering
Ya. I always thought need to revv high to blast off water. But the kuku driver in front is like cruising my through. Haha
this is where manual car becomes useful in this situation
Don't auto cars also have low gear function?
P R N D 2 usually the 2 is use a higher gear ratio for climing slopes
In conti cars is S for sports mode  which changes gear change rev
Can manually shift into a lower gear
Usually have either L or 2 and 1
Or manual shifts using gear lever or paddles
in 2006 i have floods chasing me i drive as fast as i can in segamat
But singaporeans have barely any knowledge about driving in flood
Most never experience it in their lifetime as drivers
be vigilant man. stay on high alerts do not get trapped. once trapped no way out. hard ot get out
just last year i almost got trapped. fortunately i was driving a toiyota vios where it's quite high. i had to go through floods.
if i were in m3  die
this is how you do car tests. myvy scores
